definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: This glimmering rose bronze facial glow gives your complexion a warm, delicate sheen.
sentences.chinese: 这荧玫瑰铜像面部辉光让你的肤色温暖，微妙的光泽。

sentences.english: They did right to put him up over a urinal : meeting of the waters.
sentences.chinese: 他们把他这座铜像竖在一座小便池上，倒是做对了。

sentences.english: Mansudae Grand Monument, Mansu Hill, people's revolutionary struggle memorial.
sentences.chinese: 万寿台，金日成铜像旁的人民解放纪念碑。

sentences.english: The tower is lined up directly with the statue of Kim Il-sung on Mansu Hill on the opposite side of the river.
sentences.chinese: 该塔与河对岸万寿山的金日成铜像直接排列在一起。

sentences.english: To be the statue of Chastisement cast in one piece in the mould of the law, and.
sentences.chinese: 是法律模子中浇铸出来的一整个主惩罚的铜像。

sentences.english: In front of the Hall stands a bronze statue of Dr Sun Yat-sen.
sentences.chinese: 在纪念堂前竖立着孙中山先生的铜像。

sentences.english: People bowing to Mansudae Grand Monument, Mansu Hill.
sentences.chinese: 万寿台上，向金日成铜像鞠躬的人们。

sentences.english: The Macedonian government commissioned the bronze monument as part of its efforts to claim the region's heritage.
sentences.chinese: 马其顿政府认为这座铜像是该地区的遗产之一。

sentences.english: It 5)tumbled off the shovel of their front-loader.
sentences.chinese: 当时，这个铜像从挖土机的铲斗中滚落了下来。

sentences.english: The manuscript was found but the whereabouts of the Kalpa Vigraha is still a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 手稿是找到了，可是那个铜像却始终没有着落。

sentences.english: Bronze statue of Iron Man Wang Jinxi to stand on our campus.
sentences.chinese: 铁人王进喜的铜像就伫立在我们的校园里。

sentences.english: A short while ago, I attended the unveiling of the statue of Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 刚才，我参加了孔子铜像的揭幕典礼。

definition: standing image (of a Buddha or saint)
seated image (of a Buddha or saint)
icon/iconic/religious image/figure (of Confucius, Buddha, Jesus Christ, the Virgin Mary etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1]
father or founder of a nation/Father of the Republic (Sun Yat-sen)
